chatInterface.Click on the gear icon to set the optima: Click on the gear icon to set the optimal parameters

ConfigModal.TooltipModel: Select the GPT model to use
ConfigModal.TooltipMaxTokens: Change the number of tokens that can be generated
ConfigModal.TooltipSeedNumber: The value set here affects the variation of outputs
ConfigModal.TooltipTopLogprobs: Change the number of logs to display
ConfigModal.TooltipTemperature: Lower values select more probable words
ConfigModal.TooltipTopP: Higher values make it more likely to select diverse words

FirstModal.modalDescription: Enter your API key to start using GPT-Logprobs. If you don't have one, we will guide you on how to obtain it.
FirstModal.apiKeyInstructions: See how to get your API key.

InstructionModal.modalTitle: How to Obtain ChatGPT API Key

step1.title: How to Obtain ChatGPT API Key
step1.subtitle: Create and log in to your OpenAI account
step1.description: Visit the OpenAI API page and click 'Start building'.

step2.title: How to Obtain ChatGPT API Key
step2.subtitle: Register payment information - 1
step2.description: From the settings gear icon on the top left, select 'Billing' and click 'Add payment details'. Choose 'Individual' for personal accounts or 'Company' for business accounts.

step3.title: How to Obtain ChatGPT API Key
step3.subtitle: Register payment information - 2
step3.description: Enter your credit card information. After registering your payment details, if you see 'Your subscription was created successfully', the payment information registration is complete.

step4.title: How to Obtain ChatGPT API Key
step4.subtitle: Obtain API key - 1
step4.description: Select the key icon 'API keys' on the top left and click '+Create new secret key'.

step5.title: How to Obtain ChatGPT API Key
step5.subtitle: Obtain API key - 2
step5.description: Decide the name for your API key and click 'Create secret key'.

step6.title: How to Obtain ChatGPT API Key
step6.subtitle: Obtain API key - 3
step6.description: From the pop-up 'Create new secret key', copy the API key information and make a note of it.
